org.apache.samoa.moa.classifiers.core.driftdetection

Class ADWIN

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.samoa.moa.AbstractMOAObject
      • org.apache.samoa.moa.classifiers.core.driftdetection.ADWIN
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, MOAObject

    public class ADWIN
extends AbstractMOAObject
    ADaptive sliding WINdow method. This method is a change detector and estimator. It keeps a variable-length window of recently seen items, with the property that the window has the maximal length statistically consistent with the hypothesis "there has been no change in the average value inside the window".
    Version:
    $Revision: 7 $
    Author:
    Albert Bifet (abifet at cs dot waikato dot ac dot nz)
    See Also:

        public void getDescription(StringBuilder sb,
